name: Take My Heart
content: I can't fly you to the Moon
我虽不能带你飞到月亮
Ain't got nothing in my pocket
But I got enough Love for you
但是我有对你足够的爱
女孩，我没有开着兰博基尼
All my clothes are old used
But I got enough Love for you
但是我有对你足够的爱
Can't put a price tag on it
And I'll do anything to have it
为了得到你我愿意做任何事情
Spend all my time on you
在你身上花上我所有的时间
Ain't got no time to pay
But if I gave one thing away
但是我可以给出一样东西
And let me show what you been missing
让我给你看看你失去了什么
让你看看爱可以做什么
We don't need no Magic or Money
我们不需要魔法，不需要金钱
Cause I got enough Love for you
因为我对你有足够的爱
It don't take no rocket Science
Let me promise you his one thing
That I got enough Love for you
那就是我对你有足够的爱
Can't put a price tag on it
And I'll do anything to have it
为了得到你我愿意做任何事
Spend all my time on you
为了你花上我所有的时间
Ain't got no time to pay
But if I gave one thing away
但是我可以给你一件东西
Can't put a price tag on it
And I'll do anything to have it
为了得到你我愿意做任何事
Spend all my time on you
为了你花上我所有的时间
Ain't got no time to pay
但是我可以给出一样东西
Can't put a price tag on it
And I'll do anything to have it
为了得到你我愿意做任何事
Spend all my time on you
为了你花上我所有的时间
But if I gave one thing away
但是我可以给出一样东西
